CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 15, 1954, pg. 36, reads: "Giants at YMCA Father-Son Banquet - Monte Irvin of the New York Giants, Curtis Roberts of the Pittsburgh Pirates and Willie Mays of the New York Giants are shown signing autographs last Saturday after they appeared at the YMCA's annual Father-Son Banquet, in the first photograph, top left.  The same players also gave some baseball pointers to Barry Chapman, Jimmy Benton, Errol Davis Jr. and Michael and Marshall Williams in the top right picture... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Baseball players Monte Irvin, Curtis "Curt" Roberts, and Willie Mays signing autographs for boys, including Barry Chapman, Jimmy Benton, Errol Davis Jr., Michael Williams, and Marshall Williams in YMCA gymnasium
